form.searchTemplate: index=esg_transaction AND WorkflowName!=NULL | soaekv | search /logEntry/body/subEntry/body/transactionStart/workflowName = $suser$ | rename /logEntry/body/subEntry/body/inputServerSummary/requestSize AS a | rename "/logEntry/body/subEntry/body/invocationAgentSummary[0]/requestSize" AS b | rename "/logEntry/body/subEntry/body/invocationAgentSummary[0]/responseSize" AS c | rename "/logEntry/body/subEntry/body/invocationAgentSummary[0]/requestSize" AS d | rename "/logEntry/body/subEntry/body/invocationAgentSummary[0]/responseSize" AS e | rename /logEntry/body/subEntry/body/inputServerSummary/responseSize as f | fillnull value=0 a,b,c,d,e,f | chart sum(eval(a+b+c+d+e+f)) as ByteSum over /logEntry/body/subEntry/body/inputServerSummary/protocol/address | sort 10 -ByteSum
